lead_paragraph: FIFA's ethics watchdog on Friday banned former Caribbean Football Union executive Lionel Haven from football for five years for failing to disclose information related to cash payments at a CFU event in 2011.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Ethics Panel Bans Bahamas' Havens for Five Years
headline.main: FIFA Ethics Panel Bans Bahamas' Havens for Five Years
